reviews.text:
Scott keeps in touch throughout the job, so you're never left in the dark about progress or timelines. The engine? Immaculate—he dives in as detailed as they come, banishing every speck of grime like it personally offended him. And the paint job? Scott leaves a flawless finish, buffing and polishing until it gleams like it just rolled off the showroom floor. He doesn't stop at 'good enough'; he goes the extra mile, double-checking every curve and crevice to ensure your ride looks—and feels—brand new.

-Gregory Miller

Favorite car spot! Have taken two cars here over the past 3 years and each experience is better than the next. Scott is also so great and accommodating and easy to get in touch with, he made the process a breeze.

I’m a Certified Dog Trainer and I deal with various people in order to have them bring out the best in their dogs.  I’ve been doing this since 2005.  Therefore, it is a rarity nowadays to see someone like Scott at Finesse Detailing, who brings out the best in people’s cars, by being extremely knowledgeable, detail oriented, professional, and delivering customer service on a level that I’ve never seen before.

Finesse simply does the best job. I’ve been a customer for years now and I’ve only had the best experiences. The quality of his work speaks for itself. Scott is so meticulous, he takes such great care and pride in his work. If you want your vehicle looking brand new again this is hands down the best place to bring it.

A mouse died somewhere in my old Ford sedan recently.  So, I called Scott at Finesse Detailing and he offered to help me that afternoon, immediately!  He was in the midst of other jobs, but he took a good 15 minutes to try to get the dead animal out of the car.  No luck with the "Quickie Service," but when I gave him the car for the official appointment a few days later, everything was made perfect.   Outstanding results, kind, professional service.  I highly, highly recommend Finesse Detailing for any automotive or marine detailing needs.  You will be thrilled!
